types.html:
décalage horaire m (uncountable)

  1. timezone difference
    Le décalage horaire entre Paris et Taipei est de 6 heures.
    The time difference between Paris and Taipei is 6 hours.
  2. jet lag
    • 1982, “Camino Del Sol”, in Camino Del Sol, performed by Antena:
      station balnéaire / climat tropical / décalage horaire / ambiance amicale
      (please add an English translation of this quotation)
